article: spanish prime minister jose luis rodriguez zapatero on wednesday congratulated italy 's centre-left leader romano prodi on his as yet unconfirmed election victory over sitting prime minister silvio berlusconi , the spanish leader 's office said .
abstract: spanish pm sends congratulations to prodi
